_header: Harkeneth what Saint Luke will say / In our gospel of this day
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4680.
_description: Gospel for Sixteenth Sunday after Trinity, in Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
HErknes what sainte luke will saieIn oure gospell of to
                    daie…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Tyne his praie þat he wele wendeTo haue in hell wiþ
                    outen ende
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
HErkneþ what seint luc wol sayIn vre gospel of to
                    day…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Leose his preye þat he wel wendeTo haue an helle
                    wiþ outen ende
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Ibat Ihesu in ciuitatem que vocatur naym (f.
                    207rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
HErkens what Seynt Luk wille sayIn oure godspelle of þis
                    day…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Als orisonne & deuoute prayereAls ȝe may by þis
                    tale here
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica xvja post festum trinitatis secundum Lucam (f.
                    299)

CULDd11.First Lines:
HErkeniþ what seynt Luke wile sayin oure gospel of þis
                    dayvn to a cite þat highte Naym…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…as orisons & deuoute preyereas ȝe may be þis
                    tale here
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica xvia post festum sancte trinitatis Euagelim secundum
                        Lucam. Ibat ihesus in ciuitatem que vocatur naym & ce (f.
                        189v)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
HErkeneþ what saint luc wol sayIn vre gospel of to
                    day…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Leose his pray þat he wel wendeTo haue in helle
                    withouten ende
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title:
Ibat Jhesus in ciuitatem que uocatur naym (f.
                    12rb)
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Herkens what saynt lowk wyll sayeIn our gospell of to
                    daye…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Tynre hys praye þat he wele wendeTo haue in helle with
                    outene ende

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Herkyns what saynt Luke will sayIn oure gospell of to
                    day…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…tyne hys pray þat he wole wendeto haue in hell with
                    outyn ende

HunHM129.First Lines:
Herke what seynt Luc woll sayIn oure gospel off to dayTo a
                    cyte þat heght naymȝede crist and moche folke with
                    hym…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Lesse his pary þat he well wendTo haue in hell with
                    outyn end
